name: Limitless Notion Template - Work Planner
description: If you are a kind of person who schedules work for the coming week, then this is for you!➔ list all your tasks in one place➔ easily assign days when you will work on themFeatures: 1. A Tasks table to help you jot down your todosWrite all your tasks and easily tag them to a day. Leave them unassigned to be shown to under 'Unassigned' header. you can work on them whenever you want.2. All your work at a glanceAll your Completed tasks are automatically available in the Calendar for a quick overview.
